iWant: to know the company environments/cultures - is it open-minded? conservative? exploitative? hierarchical?
soThat: I can get a feeling about them before applying, whether I would feel comfortable working there
because: I am an immigrant and hold left-wing beliefs, and don't want to deal with a hostile working environment in my daily life.
desirable: presents information + sources so I can make an informed decision
acceptable: presents incidents/'red flags' if there are any
dealBreakers: actively promoting unethical companies / decides whether a company is good/bad for you

values.explanation: I have infos to make informed decision
I receive all sources the system uses for decision
the less information the more I have to rely on the bot
bad mental health when company mistreats employees
the data used comes from employees' participation in reviewing and reporting companies/cases
data source has to be honest
getting more information helps growing my understanding
you just go through a list of sources
